name: MASK Two Two
description:
MASK II is a single player side scrolling shoot-em-up and is the second game in the M.A.S.K (Mobile Armored Strike Kommand) series that was based on a TV series / comic / toy license of the mid 1980's. The M.A.S.K organisation is once again battling the bad guys in the form of the criminal V.E.N.O.M. (Vicious Evil Network of Mayhem) organisation in their transformer like vehicles. This game consists of three missions:
  • Mission one is about destroying an oil refinery that V.E.N.O.M. have set up in the middle east as part of their bid to control oil prices.

  • Mission two starts with a tribe in the jungle who worship a fabulous ruby. V.E.N.O.M. have stolen the ruby and are using it in a laser ray gun. It is M.A.S.K.'s job to destroy the laser and to return the ruby to the tribe in the jungle.

  • Mission three sees V.E.N.O.M. holding the president of the P.N.A. hostage and the mission is to rescue him and get him to the summit talks in time to sign a peace treaty.
In each mission the player starts by selecting three M.A.S.K. agents. These should be chosen with care as the agents drive different vehicles and completing each mission will require having the right agent and their vehicle at your disposal. Once into the game the player has five lives with which they must complete their mission by driving, flying and hydro-planing across the varied terrain, battling V.E.N.O.M. vehicles, overcoming obstacles, and picking up power-ups along the way.

shot.caption: Load screen. You'll see a lot of this because the game takes an age to load...
... but you'll see a lot of this screen too because the game says its still  loading but its actually waiting for input. Luckily it plays music during this bit which is great for a while
Briefing for mission 2 : the oil mission
Team selection. There are no defaults. The idea is to move the little face thing over to one of the chairs. This brings up the agent stats and you either select or move on
With all three agents selected you move the cursor to the red 'LOAD' box in the previous screen, start the tape again, and wait
The very start of the mission and I'm already damaged. I thought I was driving along with some naff mountains in the background ...
... turns out I'm underwater so I need to transform into a boat. That's better.
Once I have the right vehicle transforming as I pass from water to land is automatic, here I am in mid transform from jeep to speedboat
I can shoot the VENOM vehicles to my hearts content but I cannot get past these barrels. Hmmm what to do?
Answer : become a truck and smash through
There are power ups to be collected. I found armour and fuel.
The truck made it over the rope bridge but now I'm stuck. I need to transform into a flying thing and that is not an option. I need to reselect my team and try again
